messages.messageBody:
Amy
If you are thinking about giving up soda maybe this
will help...The phosphates( stuff that makes the
bubbles) leeches calcium from your bones and as women
we KNOW this is a real bad thing. So fight that urge
to drink soda. Good Luck!
Jill


--- Amy <kworthen@...> wrote:
Of
> course, I realize the ideal thing is not to even use
> these, but I'm not sure
> I can give up soda (tisk, tisk on me). Anyway I'd
> appreciate info on this.
> Thanks,
> Amy
